# CHANGELOG - postfix

1.2.0 / 2017-10-10
==================

* [IMPROVEMENT] option to run the check using postqueue -p. See [#665][].


1.1.0 / 2017-08-28
==================

### Changes

* [IMPROVEMENT] run the check as the postfix user, not root. See [#619][] and [#702][]


1.0.0 / 2017-03-22
==================

### Changes

* [FEATURE] adds postfix integration.
